articles.title: Dick Cheney, one of the most powerful and polarizing vice presidents in U.S. history, dies at 84
articles.description:
Cheney died Monday night due to complications of pneumonia and cardiac and vascular disease, according to a statement from his family.

The post Dick Cheney, one of the most powerful and polarizing vice presidents in U.S. history, dies at 84 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Dick Cheney died at 84 due to pneumonia and heart complications on November 4, 2025.
Cheney's policies significantly influenced U.S. politics, impacting Boston's local governance and security.
His death may reignite debates on national security and foreign policy in Boston's political circles.
